logs.step1_raw_spec:
```plaintext
Function Separate_Vowels_And_Consonants(input_string)
    Initialize vowel_chars and consonant_chars as empty lists
    Define vowels string as "aeiouAEIOU"
    
    For each character in input_string:
        If the character is in vowels:
            Add character to vowel_chars
        Else:
            Add character to consonant_chars
    
    Return concatenated string of vowel_chars + concatenated string of consonant_chars
End Function
```
